trait Cachable<U> {
    fn load_underlying<'life0, 'async_trait>(
        &'life0 self
    ) -> Pin<Box<dyn Future<Output = Result<U, Error>> + Send + 'async_trait>>
    where
        'life0: 'async_trait,
        Self: 'async_trait;

    fn size_on_disk<'life0, 'async_trait>(
        &'life0 self
    ) -> Pin<Box<dyn Future<Output = Result<usize, Error>> + Send + 'async_trait>>
    where
        'life0: 'async_trait,
        Self: 'async_trait;

    fn save_on_disk<'life0, 'async_trait>(
        &'life0 self
    ) -> Pin<Box<dyn Future<Output = Result<(), Error>> + Send + 'async_trait>>
    where
        'life0: 'async_trait,
        Self: 'async_trait;

    fn remove_from_disk<'life0, 'async_trait>(
        &'life0 self
    ) -> Pin<Box<dyn Future<Output = Result<(), Error>> + Send + 'async_trait>>
    where
        'life0: 'async_trait,
        Self: 'async_trait;
}
Expand description

A type indicating that this return type may be cached properly in the api. These methods are required to save and load from the disk.

Required methods

    &'life0 self
) -> Pin<Box<dyn Future<Output = Result<U, Error>> + Send + 'async_trait>> where
    'life0: 'async_trait,
    Self: 'async_trait, 

Load the underlying file from the disk, or generate it fresh if it’s not there.

    'life0: 'async_trait,

Get the total size this object is taking up on the disk. Should fail if the file has not been saved to the disk.

Save this file to the disk, so that it is cached for future use. May require regeneration of the file.
